from fastapi import FastAPI, WebSocket, Receive, Send
app = FastAPI()

stored_data = []
socket = app.websocket('/ws/stream')
def websocket_connection(websocket: WebSocket):
    async for message in websocket:
        data = await message
        stored_data.append(data)
        await websocket.send_text('Data received and processed!')
